Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.utility

Class Limiter

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.utility.Limiter
public final class Limiter extends Object
A timer which is ready after a set number of ns have elapsed since its previous ready state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Limiter

      public Limiter(long frequency)
      Constructs a new limiter.
      Parameters:
      frequency - minimum ns that must elapse between ready states

  • Method Details

    • fromConfig

      public static Limiter fromConfig(Class<? extends GameSystem> c)
      Parameters:
      c - game system to get limiter configuration for
      Returns:
      limiter using TPS (ticks per second) specified in c's configuration; or no limit if no configuration

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady(long dt)
      Adds elapsed time to this limiter and checks its ready state.
      Parameters:
      dt - additional elapsed ns
      Returns:
      true if >= frequency ns have elapsed since the last time this was ready

      public long consumeElapsed()
      Returns elapsed ns since last consumption of this limiter and resets elapsed.
